summary: Follows Diogenes as he goes about his day as a police officer. He's prone to do things the right way, surrounded by a pretty much corrupt & citizen distant police department, & always resolves his duties with a personal method.
cast: Cantinflas|Ana Bertha Lepe|Valeria Pani|Wolf Ruvinskis|Julio Alejandro Lobato|Ramón Menéndez|Carlos Riquelme|Samia Farah|Rosángela Balbó|Omar Alexander Baez|Yolanda Rigel|Mayte Carol|María Montaño|César Sobrevals|Ángel de la Peña García|Federico González|Jose Luis Said|Eduardo Noriega|Amparo Arozamena|Laura Zapata|Alejandro Ciangherotti|Ofelia Guilmáin|Fernando Luján|Pompín Iglesias|Eva Calvo|Guillermo Orea|Norma Herrera|Alfonso Carti|Alberto Catalá|Leonardo Daniel|Cecilia Leger|Maricruz Nájera|Carlos Suárez|Marcelo Villamil|Fernando Yapur
title: El patrullero 777
